mapper.insert: insert into board_data_table(boardWriter, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
insert into board_addfile_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, aId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{aId})
mapper.select: select id, boardTitle, boardWriter, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board_data_table order by id desc

select id, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board_data_table where ${type} like concat('%',#{q},'%') order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(id) from board_data_table where ${type} like concat('%',#{q},'%')
mapper.update: update board_data_table set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id = #{id}
update board_data_table set boardHits = boardHits +1 where id = #{id}
